title.en: Short Praise of the Buddha's Deeds

text.en: When you were born, chief among human beings,
text.en-trans: gang tsé kang nyi tsowo khyö tam tsé

text.en: You took seven steps on this earth and said:
text.en-trans: sa chen di la gompa dün bor né

text.en: “In this world I am supreme.”
text.en-trans: nga ni jikten di na chok ché sung

text.en: To you, O wise one, I pay homage!1
text.en-trans: detsé khepa khyö la chaktsal lo

text.en: First, you descended from the heaven of Tuṣita,
text.en-trans: dangpo ganden lha yi yul né jön

text.en: And in the royal home entered your mother’s womb;
text.en-trans: gyalpö khab tu yum gyi lhum su zhuk

text.en: In the grove at Lumbinī, O sage, you were born:
text.en-trans: lumbini yi tsal du tubpa tam

text.en: To the victorious ‘god among gods’, I pay homage!
text.en-trans: chomden lha yi lha la chaktsal lo

text.en: You were tended by thirty-two nurses at the palace,
text.en-trans: zhalyé khang du mama gyé zhi chö

text.en: You spent your youth in sports at the house of the Śākyas;
text.en-trans: shakyé drong du zhönnü roltsé dzé

text.en: At Kapilavastu you took Gopā as your wife:
text.en-trans: serkyé né su sa tso khab tu zhé

text.en: To you who are unequalled in the three worlds, I pay homage!
text.en-trans: si sum tsungmé ku la chaktsal lo

text.en: At the four city gates, you were shown the four kinds of sorrow,
text.en-trans: drongkhyer go zhir kyowé tsul ten né

text.en: And cut your own hair in front of the Viśuddha Stūpa;
text.en-trans: chörten namdak drung du utra sil

text.en: On the banks of the Nairañjanā you practised as an ascetic:
text.en-trans: nairanjané dram du katub dzé

text.en: To you who are free from the faults of the two obscurations, I pay homage!
text.en-trans: drib nyi kyön dangdral la chaktsal lo

text.en: At Rājagṛha you tamed a rogue elephant,
text.en-trans: gyalpö khab tu langchen nyönpa tul

text.en: In Vaiśālī the monkeys offered you honey;
text.en-trans: yangpachen du pé'ü drangtsi pul

text.en: In Magadha, O sage, you realized buddhahood:
text.en-trans: magadha ru tubpa ngön sangye

text.en: To you in whom omniscient wisdom blossomed, I pay homage!
text.en-trans: khyenpé yeshe bar la chaktsal lo

text.en: At Vārāṇasī you turned the wheel of Dharma,
text.en-trans: varanasir chö kyi khorlo kor

text.en: And in the Jeta Grove you showed great miracles;
text.en-trans: dzeté tsal du chotrul chenpo ten

text.en: At Kuśinagara your wisdom mind passed into parinirvāṇa:
text.en-trans: tsachok drong du gongpa nya ngen dé

text.en: To you whose mind is like the sky, I pay homage!
text.en-trans: tuk ni namkha dra la chaktsal lo

text.en: Through the merit of this brief praise of
text.en-trans: ditar tenpé dakpo chomdendé

text.en: The deeds of the Enlightened One, Master of the Teaching,
text.en-trans: dzepé tsul la do tsam töpa yi

text.en: May the actions of all living beings
text.en-trans: gewé drowa kün gyi chöpa yang

text.en: Come to equal the acts of the Sugata himself.
text.en-trans: deshek nyi kyi dzé dang tsungpar shok
